    • Method Detail

      • randomWeather

        public void randomWeather()
        Change weather randomly by chance

      • changeWeather

        public void changeWeather(java.lang.String weatherType)
        This method changes the current weather. It will call the changeIcon method and the changeStats method. It will also decide when the next change in weather will occur.
        Parameters:
        weatherType - - the linked controller

      • getWeatherType

        public java.lang.String getWeatherType()
        Returns WeatherType
        Returns:
        weatherType - Type of weather. By example "Sunny"

      • setWeatherType

        public void setWeatherType(java.lang.String weatherType)
        Set the current weather
        Parameters:
        weatherType - new weather type

      • getChangeWeatherStep

        public int getChangeWeatherStep()
        Returns changeWeatherStep
        Returns:
        changeWeatherStep - This contains the value of the step in which the weather changes
